message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $2000000. This exceptional opportunity is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1500000 for the product. Could we possibly work towards a mutually beneficial agreement within this price range?
